PRIVACY POLICY

Havenn collects minimal customer information strictly for account, subscription billing, and service enhancement. We ensure that all user data is securely stored and never sold or disclosed to any third-party without consent.

TERMS & CONDITIONS

✅Havenn operates via monthly recurring subscription plans.
✅No refunds shall be entertained on ongoing or past subscriptions.
✅Access automatically pauses if payment fails or is not received.
